name: GetDisputeEvidenceMetadata
description:
Retrieve metadata for specified dispute evidence.

Call this tool to obtain metadata of dispute evidence using a given dispute ID and evidence ID. Ensure to maintain a copy of any evidence uploaded as it cannot be downloaded later.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dispute to retrieve its evidence metadata.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute from which you want to retrieve evidence metadata.

parameters.name: evidence_id
parameters.description: The ID of the evidence you wish to retrieve metadata for. Ensure correct ID is provided to access the specific evidence details.

value_schema.description: The ID of the evidence to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The ID of the dispute from which you want to retrieve evidence metadata.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute from which you want to retrieve evidence metadata.

parameters.name: evidence_id
parameters.description: The ID of the evidence to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the evidence to retrieve.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
